text: King of the Gypsies is a 1978 American drama movie directed by Frank Pierson and based on the 1975 novel of the same name by Peter Maas. It stars Eric Roberts, Susan Sarandon, Brooke Shields, Judd Hirsch, Shelley Winters, Annette O'Toole and Sterling Hayden and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1978 crime drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: King of the Gypsies (movie)
